Text: I am downloading this to confirm its authenticity. If it is real, I thank you greatly. I've been waiting for this for ages. I shall seed until it hurts, then I shall seed some more.

if it's scenebalance, it's authentic.

They might have probs with seeding, and other bs, but their files are legit.

BTW, why have you been waiting for this "for ages"?

Didn't this episode air on Thursday?  a few days is not "ages".

"ages" is more like a week, maybe a month, if you're an ADD short attention span ritalin child.

I meant to say "for what seemed like ages" and it was Wednesday, not Thursday. Usually these episodes come online the night after, not five.

Also, I am glad to see it's authentic.
